title: What the fuck is wrong with queueing today?
body:
Season ended and apparently EVERY TEAMMATE I HAVE BECOMES A FULL BLOWN 0/900/0 FEEDER AND TOXIC TROLL????

Someone queue with me to end this nightmare...

replies.body:
One of the things I am seeing, and this is just my observation. But I see alot of games fall apart because people are too busy climbing onto thier high horse and talking down to thier team. The season is over, people of ALL skill levels are being thrown back together. But it is REALLY hard to focus when you have people on your team who would rather tell you how "great" they are at the game. While at the same time they will sit on a high horse, and tell thier teammates just how Pathetic and trash they are. 
Miss a minion last hit? "omg u noob, useless adc" 
Miss an ability? gonna hear about it. 
My last game was ruined because adc Was trashing on support and Jungle harped on the ENTIRE GAME because adc -accidentally- last hit a camp, we didnt hear the end of it till the surrender vote. 

long story short, Ranked is over. people being jumbled together. And instead of trying to help players improve, higher tier players are content to just sit on a high horse and spit on those they see "beneath them" 
Lost count how many times I have been reminded just how "trash" I was just for being in bronze. 
if there is one thing that gets under my skin, its the arrogance of high-tier players who cant get their Nose out of the air! thats one thing that usually sets me on tilt. 
You are a good player, I get it. You dont have to tell me how "Scum of the earth" bronze I am just to remind me.

> [{quoted}](name=Damagefox,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=q9t1sPqj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-09T10:50:47.375+0000)
>
> One of the things I am seeing, and this is just my observation. But I see alot of games fall apart because people are too busy climbing onto thier high horse and talking down to thier team. The season is over, people of ALL skill levels are being thrown back together. But it is REALLY hard to focus when you have people on your team who would rather tell you how "great" they are at the game. While at the same time they will sit on a high horse, and tell thier teammates just how Pathetic and trash they are. 
> Miss a minion last hit? "omg u noob, useless adc" 
> Miss an ability? gonna hear about it. 
> My last game was ruined because adc Was trashing on support and Jungle harped on the ENTIRE GAME because adc -accidentally- last hit a camp, we didnt hear the end of it till the surrender vote. 
> 
> long story short, Ranked is over. people being jumbled together. And instead of trying to help players improve, higher tier players are content to just sit on a high horse and spit on those they see "beneath them" 
> Lost count how many times I have been reminded just how "trash" I was just for being in bronze. 
> if there is one thing that gets under my skin, its the arrogance of high-tier players who cant get their Nose out of the air! thats one thing that usually sets me on tilt. 
> You are a good player, I get it. You dont have to tell me how "Scum of the earth" bronze I am just to remind me.

Eh, I get this a little bit. But I really have no idea how to help the 0/8/0 Twitch by 7 minutes who suicided into lane every second he could EVEN WITH ME using a Tahm Kench to w him out half the time.  Seriously bugs me when those scum of the earth higher tiers decide I'm absolute shit class because I can't carry that sort of thing. They couldn't either. Guaranteed.  

Personally, I blame the matchmaking.  Should be impossible for ANYONE ranked above silver to queue into leveler accounts.  I'd say ANY rank but well, I'll settle for less. How it's acceptable that a Diamond tier player with full runes and masteries is able to queue into level 18 or below accounts is simply a complete FAILURE in matchmaking code. It's disgusting.  I'm all for letting players of all ranks fight each other. But at least make that be level 30's fighting each other. Not leveler accounts vs. Diamonds and Plats. That's unacceptable.
That normally happens after season end, and people don't start playing right until season is about to start again

> [{quoted}](name=A Bloo Banana,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=q9t1sPqj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-09T02:53:15.878+0000)
>
> That normally happens after season end, and people don't start playing right until season is about to start again

Fuck the season, I'm a fucking levelers... queuing into DIAMOND AND PLATINUM PLAYERS... not smurfs... legit on diamond and platinum players and my team feeds 9000 kills before we're level 10.
That's because they don't care... early preseason is basically just normals or aram for most people, them smurfing or not doesn't mean anything.
Blowing steam after not getting to where they wanted? Relaxing after tense ranked games? I honestly don't know this community.

> [{quoted}](name=FlamingEnemy13,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=q9t1sPqj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-09T02:43:27.806+0000)
>
> Blowing steam after not getting to where they wanted? Relaxing after tense ranked games? I honestly don't know this community.

I'd have loved to do that today. Yet I'm queuing into fucking diamonds on a leveler account.  I don't have full runes or masteries and I'm expected to play against the best players in the game?

Same here on my Eu acc. In Ranked Flex I won 7 out of 10 promo games, got Silver 5. 
So I started my Silver 5 experience with 3 hopeless losses where my team mates were total trolls or unskilled. Did not even make a sense to encourage or flame them because how badly they were losing the games.
